title: Bug 17289: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When attempting to click on the first Combo, it does not receive focus.
OB: Clicking on the first Combo does not result in the Combo receiving focus.
EB: When clicking on the first Combo, it should receive focus.
SR: To reproduce the issue: Open the "Add a new CVS Repository" dialog. Press the "Tab" key and verify that the focus moves to the second Combo labeled "Repository Path:".
